name: Deep Jumper
description:
How would you feel suppossing you were falling deeper and deeper into the darkness?

Terrified or excited?

That’s why I gave you flashlight. It’s pretty useful to see more things. However it’s not ussual flashlight as you may expect. It has little microchip which allows you to see traps. Be careful, cause your battery won’t last forever, but fortunately it can recharge over time.

———————————————————————————————————————————

What about your journey? It’ll be difficult. It can make you angry. It can make you cry trying not to touch shitty platform, but still game may be enjoyable.

———————————————————————————————————————————

Keep an eye on your health. You have only 5 lifes. Whenever you touch trap you’ll lose 1 life and teleport to last checkpoint. When you are teleported you get invulnerability but you’ll also slower. (Be careful not to lose more lifes when spawning). When your number of lifes decrease to 0, level will restart and you’ll have to do everything again.

———————————————————————————————————————————

There’re two types of traps:

  1. Simple traps that are set on platforms
  2. Shooting walls (it sounds weird, but that’s what they do) shoots projectiles. You can barely see bullets, if you don’t use flashlight.

———————————————————————————————————————————

Just to make some purpose in my game I’ve added time, so you can see your highscore in main menu at bottom left.

———————————————————————————————————————————

Control:

Left Mouse Button (LMB) - flashlight

Right Mouse Button (RMB) - scanner (for traps)

A/D or Left Arrow / RightArrow - horizontal movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - used to point flashlight

———————————————————————————————————————————

Hope you’ll like it! Note that that’s my 2nd game I’ve ever published

Made for Ludum Dare 48 (1,5 day)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deep-jumper
